emailCount.title: emailCount
emailCount.description: The total number of EmailMessage records that were successfully created and saved to Salesforce. Returns 0 if the operation failed or no emails were generated.

message.title: message
message.description: Human-readable message describing the result of the email generation operation. Includes success confirmation with count or specific error details for troubleshooting.

success.title: success
success.description: Boolean indicating whether the email generation operation completed successfully. Returns true if emails were created, false if there were any errors during the process.
